document.full_text: the assault on the provincial council in tikrit was a stark reminder of the country's stubborn insurgency and an army and police force that still have glaring deficiencies and suspect loyalties.
document.title: through political prism, iraqis grieve
lines_and_colors: the assault on the provincial council in tikrit was a stark reminder of the country's stubborn insurgency and an army and police force that still have glaring deficiencies and suspect loyalties.
